channel.title: Looking for a long time coder
channel.description: Hey my server has been up for almost 2 months, i started it not knowing what a vps was, or how to add basicly anything to my server. I have learned as the month passed, but I need a PR0 CODER. I need someone that is very good at coding, and is willing to code for my server for a while, in return you will be co owner. I am currently on the moparscape server sponsor page, with 70+ players online. If you are willing to code please send me a message, or add me on msn- x-x--g--x-x@live.com ~thanks~

item.title: Looking for a long time coder
item.dc:creator: @sabsabi sabsabi
item.description:
@sabsabi wrote:

lol mmk sounds like u had a bad day… want to talk it over?

You Fail in real life, poor you dude.

Read full topic

item.title: Looking for a long time coder
item.dc:creator: @badger41 badger41
item.description:
@badger41 wrote:

so sad to see someone try and get mod that much lol, you follow the rules to much bro, just chill out

how about you learn to read the rules and post in the right section, and he wont flame you

Read full topic
item.source: Looking for a long time coder

item.title: Looking for a long time coder
item.dc:creator: @itai itai
item.description:
@itai wrote:

lol mmk sounds like u had a bad day… want to talk it over?

Yes I do.

[quote=“MrPurple436648, post:5, topic:332596”]Its actually not that hard. A “PRO Coder” could be anyone who has studied to be honest. I read TUT’s and read all through these forums for one week. Learned what i wanted to add, and take out. Whatever i wanted to know (for me) is on this forum, i just searched for it.
Instead of giving someone Co-Owner to code your server, do it yourself. yes it will take time, yes a lot of time. But when you get done, you will know everything you wanted to know. And can call yourself a “Pro Coder”.

(I am far from a “Pro Coder” but hey im better off then some people, and it took barely anytime.)

And yes i think Itaiis right, if someone was a pro coder and do everything correct, they would make there out BEAST LIKE server and run it for themselves with VPS.

Trust me dude, everything you need is located on these fourms.

(All that was just a opinion to help you out, if you still want to higher someone that is fine. its your choice, just offering)[/quote]
Your right.

sabsabi:

Nice sponsor,and we dont have any sponsor sabsabionline has 450+ all time. =) and also you looking for a coder without one cent pay? LOL you wish bro.

Ive been on ur server, its awesome…FREE PL0X?

Read full topic
item.source: Looking for a long time coder

~thanks~[/quote]

item.title: Looking for a long time coder
item.dc:creator: @MrPurple436648 MrPurple436648
item.description:
@MrPurple436648 wrote:

Its actually not that hard. A “PRO Coder” could be anyone who has studied to be honest. I read TUT’s and read all through these forums for one week. Learned what i wanted to add, and take out. Whatever i wanted to know (for me) is on this forum, i just searched for it.
Instead of giving someone Co-Owner to code your server, do it yourself. yes it will take time, yes a lot of time. But when you get done, you will know everything you wanted to know. And can call yourself a “Pro Coder”.

(I am far from a “Pro Coder” but hey im better off then some people, and it took barely anytime.)

And yes i think Itaiis right, if someone was a pro coder and do everything correct, they would make there out BEAST LIKE server and run it for themselves with VPS.

Trust me dude, everything you need is located on these fourms.

(All that was just a opinion to help you out, if you still want to higher someone that is fine. its your choice, just offering)

Read full topic

item.title: Looking for a long time coder
item.dc:creator: @itai itai
item.description:
@itai wrote:

so sad to see someone try and get mod that much lol, you follow the rules to much bro, just chill out

Actually no I don’t give a fuck about mod/admin/whatever.
But what does annoy me is when people can’t do shit themselves and resort to having someone else.

item.title: Looking for a long time coder
item.dc:creator: @noobs_are_ftw noobs are ftw
item.description:
@noobs_are_ftw wrote:

[quote=“itai, post:2, topic:332596”]Ok, I see several problems wrong here.
1.) WRONG SECTION!
2.) If you are going to put a server up don’t do it being a complete idiot, and then go and ask for a “pro” coder because you can’t learn and do it yourself.
3.) A pro coder probably can make their own server and get it vps themselves instead of being co.
End of case.[/quote]

Read full topic
item.source: Looking for a long time coder
